snippet: Steven Kaplan’s B.R.A. CX3 kit car, a replica Morgan three-wheeler, didn’t come easy. But after a six-year building effort, he now rides through his Queens neighborhood in style.
abstract: Steven Kaplan of Rego Park, Queens, owns a BRA CX3, two-seat, three-wheeled roadster that he built from a kit; vehicle, officially classified as a motorcycle, is manufactured as a replica of a classic three-wheel vehicle made by Morgan.
lead_paragraph: Steven Kaplan’s B.R.A. CX3 kit car, a replica Morgan three-wheeler, didn’t come easy. But after a six-year building effort, he now rides through his Queens neighborhood in style.

headline.seo: A Kit With Few Instructions Inspires an Improv Act
headline.main: A Kit With Few Instructions Inspires an Improv Act
headline.print_headline: A Kit With Few Instructions Inspires an Improv Act
